sections.heading: personnel officer; appointment; qualifications
sections.text: The board of county commissioners shall appoint a county personnel officer who shall be a person experienced in the field of personnel administration and in known sympathy with the application of merit principles in public employment.SourceLaws 1974, LB

23-2523.County personnel officer; appointment; qualifications.

The board of county commissioners shall appoint a county personnel officer who shall be a person experienced in the field of personnel administration and in known sympathy with the application of merit principles in public employment.

SourceLaws 1974, LB 995, ยง 7.
